== Description ==

Get a full blog URL, given a blog name.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_blogaddress_by_name( $blogname ) ?>%%%
== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$blogname|string|The (subdomain or directory) name|required}}

== Return Values ==

{{Return||string|The full blog URL}}
